thread.title: Shoaib Malik added in Pakistan Test Squad against England
thread.title_full: Shoaib Malik added in Pakistan Test Squad against England

author: Dua
title: Shoaib Malik added in Pakistan Test Squad against England
text: Cricket Â· Dubai, Former test captain and leading all rounder, Shoaib Malik showed tremendous performance in the T20 and one day international matches series. Now it is decided by the management of Pakistan cricket team to include him in the test squad against England. Pakistan is going to play the test matches series against England in UAE and the test squad is already announced. On the request of manager and head coach of Pakistan cricket team, Pakistan cricket board included Shoaib Malik in the test squad as 16 th player. The chief selector, Haroon Rashid said that Pakistan cricket team would get the benefit with the inclusion of Shoaib Malik in the national test team. Shoaib Malik played the last test match in 2010 against England and after that, he was not selected in the test squad of Pakistan. He played 32 test matches in his test career and he scored 1606 runs in which he made 2 centuries and 8 half centuries. Advertisement
